TITLE: Lake Ice Coverage from Lake Erken: DATA POLICY: SITES data is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 international licence (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
COMMENTS: Visual observation of lake ice coverage.
The PERIOD_ICE is defined as the time from the first complete freezing (>75%)
mid-eastern Sweden: in which the ice remains frozen

TITLE: Lake Ice Coverage from Lake Erken: As the observation is conducted visually
mid-eastern Sweden: the definitions of TIME_ICE_ON and TIME_ICE_OFF are subjective to some extent depending on the observer.

TITLE: Lake Ice Coverage from Lake Erken: Ice periods before TIMESTAMP '1954' are gap filled with data from the the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute (https://www.smhi.se/data).
Short periods of freezing and melting of ice are not accounted for in the data. N/A in the data describes NOT AVAILABLE (i.e. years with no observations).
The TIME_ICE_ON and TIME_ICE_OFF dates are defined for the location of observation
mid-eastern Sweden: not necessarily the lake as a whole.

column3: e.g. Ice coverage between winter 2022/23 is defined as TIMESTAMP = 2023

TITLE: Lake Ice Coverage from Lake Erken: TIME_ICE_ON - Time for Start of ice coverage (>75% of lake surface) in (YYYY-MM-DD)
TIME_ICE_OFF - Time for End of ice coverage (<75% of lake surface) in (YYYY-MM-DD)
PERIOD_ICE - Time period in number of days in (P#D); where # = total number of days of ice coverage
